snippet: The Bread Lab at Washington State University is working to improve the quality of the chain’s tortillas and make them as tasty as an abuelita’s.
abstract: Chain restaurant Chipotle Mexican Grill has tasked Bread Lab at Washington State University with creating tortilla that tastes homemade but can be produced on mass scale; project is part of chain's effort to raise nutritional value of its food.
lead_paragraph: The Bread Lab at Washington State University is working to improve the quality of the chain’s tortillas and make them as tasty as an abuelita’s.

headline.main: Chipotle’s Quest to Develop a Better Tortilla
headline.print_headline: Chipotle’s Quest to Make Artisanal Tortillas
